verses.text: Now \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w kept|strong="H1961"\w* the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* of \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w* his father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w*, the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*: and he \w led|strong="H5090"\w* the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* to the \w backside|strong="H0310"\w* of the \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add even\add* to \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*.

And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto him in a \w flame|strong="H3827"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of a \w bush|strong="H5572"\w*: and he \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, the \w bush|strong="H5572"\w* \w burned|strong="H1197"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and the \w bush|strong="H5572"\w* \add was\add* not \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will now turn \w aside|strong="H5493"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sight|strong="H4758"\w*, \w why|strong="H4069"\w* the \w bush|strong="H5572"\w* is not \w burnt|strong="H1197"\w*.

And when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that he turned \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* unto him out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w bush|strong="H5572"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Here \add am\add* I.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Draw not \w nigh|strong="H7126"\w* \w hither|strong="H1988"\w*: put \w off|strong="H5394"\w* thy \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w* from off thy \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, for the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w whereon|strong="H0834"\w* thou \w standest|strong="H5975"\w* \add is\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*.

Moreover he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*. And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*; for he was \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* to \w look|strong="H5027"\w* upon \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w surely|strong="H7200"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* the \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* which \add are\add* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* their \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* by \w reason|strong="H6440"\w* of their \w taskmasters|strong="H5065"\w*; for I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* their \w sorrows|strong="H4341"\w*;

And I am come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* them out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*, and to \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* them up out of that \w land|strong="H0776"\w* unto a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* and a \w large|strong="H7342"\w*, unto a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*; unto the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, and the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, and the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and the \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, and the \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, and the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*.

Now therefore, behold, the \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto me: and I have also \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* the \w oppression|strong="H3906"\w* wherewith the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w oppress|strong="H3905"\w* them.

\w Come|strong="H3212"\w* now therefore, and I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* thee unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, that thou mayest bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, Who \add am\add* I, that I should \w go|strong="H3212"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and that I should bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*?

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Certainly I will be with thee; and this \add shall be\add* a \w token|strong="H0226"\w* unto thee, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* I have \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* thee: When thou hast brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, ye shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* upon this \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, Behold, \add when\add* I \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, The \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me unto you; and they shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to me, What \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*? what shall I \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them?

And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, I \w AM|strong="H1961"\w* THAT I \w AM|strong="H1961"\w*: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus shalt thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, I AM hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me unto you.

And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w moreover|strong="H5750"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Thus shalt thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me unto you: this \add is\add* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, and this \add is\add* my \w memorial|strong="H2143"\w* unto \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, of \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w surely|strong="H6485"\w* \w visited|strong="H6485"\w* you, and \add seen\add* that which is \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to you in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*:

And I have \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* you up out of the \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, and the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, and the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and the \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, and the \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, and the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*, unto a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*.

And they shall \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*: and thou shalt \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, thou and the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and ye shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w* hath \w met|strong="H7136"\w* with us: and now let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, we beseech thee, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days’|strong="H3117"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, that we may \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ And I am \w sure|strong="H3045"\w* that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* will not \w let|strong="H5414"\w* you \w go|strong="H1980"\w*, no, not by a \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 3.19 \ft no…: or, but by strong hand\f*

And I will stretch \w out|strong="H7971"\w* my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* with all my \w wonders|strong="H6381"\w* which I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* thereof: and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that he will let you \w go|strong="H7971"\w*.

And I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w favour|strong="H2580"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*: and it shall come to pass, that, when ye \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, ye shall not \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*:

But every \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* shall \w borrow|strong="H7592"\w* of her \w neighbour|strong="H7934"\w*, and of her that \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w* in her \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w raiment|strong="H8071"\w*: and ye shall \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \add them\add* upon your \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and upon your \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*; and ye shall \w spoil|strong="H5337"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*.\f + \fr 3.22 \ft the Egyptians: or, Egypt\f*
